item.value:
module PostsHelper def islink? url if (/http|https|www/.match(x)) return true else return false end end
def whichlink url case url when url.include?("youtube") auto_html(url) {youtube} when url.include?("soundcloud") auto_html(url) {soundcloud} when url.include?("dailymotion") auto_html(url) {dailymotion} when (url.match(/jpg|png|gif|bmp|jpeg/) auto_html(url) {image} when url.include?("vimeo") auto_html(url) {vimeo} else auto_html(url) {link :target => "_blank", :rel => "nofollow"} end end def url_matching url spacesplit = url.split(" ") spacesplit.each do |s| if (islink? s) return whichlink s end end end end end

module PostsHelper def islink? url if (/http|https|www/.match(x)) return true else return false end end
def whichlink url case url when url.include?("youtube") auto_html(url) {youtube} when url.include?("soundcloud") auto_html(url) {soundcloud} when url.include?("dailymotion") auto_html(url) {dailymotion} when (url.match(/jpg|png|gif|bmp|jpeg/) auto_html(url) {image} when url.include?("vimeo") auto_html(url) {vimeo} else auto_html(url) {link :target => "_blank", :rel => "nofollow"} end end def url_matching url spacesplit = url.split(" ") spacesplit.each do |s| if (islink? s) return whichlink s end end end end end
